body.p: includes a dynamic feature where certain editing contexts will trigger a floating toolbar with common actions that are available in the current editing context.
The floating contextual toolbar is automatically displayed in various situations. For example, it appears when you select content inside a paragraph, table cell, list item, and more.
Controlling the context in which a floating contextual toolbar will appear and what controls it should contain is done using CSS. You can find more details about this in the customisation guide.
